info.author: Piers Harding
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
saprfc is a Python module to facilitate RFC calls to an SAP R/3 system of
release 3.1x or above.  The fundamental purpose of the production of this
package, is to provide a clean object oriented interface to RFC calls from
within Python.  Includes RFC calls, Registered RFCs, and tRFC server programming.
info.name: saprfc
info.summary: SAP R/3 RFC language binding for Python
info.html_description: saprfc is a Python module to facilitate RFC calls to an SAP R/3 system of release 3.1x or above. The fundamental purpose of the production of this package, is to provide a clean object oriented interface to RFC calls from within Python. Includes RFC calls, Registered RFCs, and tRFC server programming.
